mapper.select: select str from ( select substr(orderid,0,instr(orderid,'@',-1)-1) as str from orders where orderid like #{memid}) group by str
select * from (select orderid, orderqty, orderuse, memid, products.* from orders, selllist, products where orders.prodid = selllist.prodid and products.prodid = orders.prodid) where memid = #{memid}
